about_the_game:
1) Instantly unlocks 4 Heroes: Lane, Isna, Forga, Neri
2) Unique Founder's Badge
3) +1 Builder
4) +5000 Gems

If you have anything from the list already, you'll be refunded in Gems.
detailed_description:
1) Instantly unlocks 4 Heroes: Lane, Isna, Forga, Neri
2) Unique Founder's Badge
3) +1 Builder
4) +5000 Gems

If you have anything from the list already, you'll be refunded in Gems.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Max OS X or later
  • Processor: Any
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Max OS X or later
  • Processor: Any
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any

name: UnnyWorld - Founder's Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP or later
  • Processor: x86-compatible 800MHz processor
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX-compatible 3D graphics with at least 64MB of addressable memory (such as an ATI Radeon 7200, NVIDIA GeForce 2, or Intel GMA 950)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows XP or later
  • Processor: x86-compatible 800MHz processor
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX-compatible 3D graphics with at least 64MB of addressable memory (such as an ATI Radeon 7200, NVIDIA GeForce 2, or Intel GMA 950)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: UnnyWorld Founder's Pack will help you to dive in the game instantly.
supported_languages:
English*, Russian, Turkish, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Italian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
